text:
The days and hours during which each market shall operate shall be fixed by the rules and regulations adopted and promulgated by the Agricultural Commissioner. 
(Ord. No. 3758(1939), Sec. 10; amended by Ord. 64-96, App. 2/9/96; Ord. 278-96, App. 7/3/96; Ord. 276-99, File No. 991545, App. 10/29/99)
